casebody.data:
In the Matter of David H. ORNITZ and Samuel B. Ornitz, Individually, etc., Bankrupts, Petitioners-Appellants. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. October 6, 1926.) No. 17. Joseph H. Kohan and Petersen, Steiner & Kohan, all of New York City, for appellants. Walter S. Hilbom, C. Edward Benoit, and Gallert, Hilbom & Raphael, all of New York City, for appellees.

*1023Before HOUGH, MANTON, and HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
